extension.description: Aeon Nox utilise presque toutes les vues du skin d'origine Aeon, ces mods et les textures du thème Black. Confluence de Jezz_X est la base de ce skin. Tout le mérite aux responsables de ces skins et mods

Aeon Nox started out as a mod of Aeon based on the Confluence skin. Since then it has evolved into a skin with much more views and support for all new add-ons.[CR]Most of Aeon Nox' views are based on the Aeon65 mod by phil65, while other views are original designs or based on views from other skins.[CR]Skins that were a great inspiration for the design of Aeon Nox include:[CR]- Aeon65 by phil65[CR]- Alaska Revisited by Hitcher[CR]- Fusion by Arcanthur[CR]- reFocus by Jeroen[CR]- Xperience by Team Blackbolt[CR]- Simplicity by Team S3[CR]- Confluence by Jezz_X
